abstract: The law firm’s fortunes worsened after photos emerged of a Halloween party at the firm showing employees wearing costumes mocking people who had lost their homes.
snippet: The law firm’s fortunes worsened after photos emerged of a Halloween party at the firm showing employees wearing costumes mocking people who had lost their homes.
lead_paragraph: A law firm that had become a lightning rod in the controversy over mortgage-foreclosure practices has shut down, costing 89 employees their jobs.

headline.main: Foreclosure Firm Steven J. Baum to Close Down
